docs.title: LAB TITLE – Practical Refresher
docs.text: Date: YYYY-MM-DD Skill Area: Linux | RHCSA | Kali | Cloud | DevSecOps | Scripting

docs.title: Cloud
docs.text: This section covers AWS, Azure, and GCP engineering along with DevSecOps practices as a core sub-domain.

docs.title: Subtopics
docs.text:
• AWS, Azure, GCP: Architecture, IAM, Storage, and Networking
  • DevSecOps: CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), secrets management, automation, and cloud security patterns

docs.title: DevSecOps (Under Cloud)
docs.text: Covers the intersection of cloud engineering and security automation — pipelines, IaC, continuous monitoring, and secure configuration management.

docs.title: Example Topics
docs.text:
• Implementing CI/CD pipelines with security gates
  • Scanning Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
  • Managing secrets and policies securely

docs.title: Linux Proficiency Track
docs.text: Covers Red Hat Linux (RHCSA preparation), system administration, shell scripting, hardening, and Kali Linux exploration.

docs.title: Subtopics
docs.text:
• Core Linux Labs: Permissions, users, networking, systemctl
  • Kali Linux: Ethical hacking tools, forensic setup, penetration test environment

docs.title: Kali Linux Labs
docs.text: Focus on penetration testing fundamentals, ethical hacking environment setup, and tool usage refresher.

docs.title: Example Topics
docs.text:
• Setting up Kali in a VM
  • Using nmap for discovery
  • hydra, metasploit, and burp basics

docs.title: Software Development
docs.text: Includes Python, Bash, and VBA scripting exercises, automation, and coding refreshers.
